infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: This app uses the camera for AR selfies with historical mustaches.
infoPlist.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: This app uses location to discover historical treasures near you.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: This app saves AR selfie photos to your photo library.
infoPlist.NSMicrophoneUsageDescription: This app may use microphone for camera functionality.

plugins.cameraPermission: Allow Jelačićeva Potkova to access your camera for AR selfies with historical mustaches.

plugins.locationAlwaysAndWhenInUsePermission: Allow Jelačićeva Potkova to use your location for treasure hunting.

plugins.photosPermission: Allow Jelačićeva Potkova to save AR selfie photos to your photo library.
plugins.savePhotosPermission: Allow Jelačićeva Potkova to save photos.
